divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving east on Ann towards Jones and observed what at first appeared to be an odd shaped helicopter hovering slowly in varied directions. It was moving slowly, so didn't think much of it. Then I turned away for about 2 seconds and it was gone. No clouds in the sky to hide behind and it would've taken at least 5-6 seconds to fall out of view.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Hovering object vanished from a cloudless sky.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There was one other sighting in Las Vegas on or around March 12th 2013
